summary: Mod adds a staff game based on the anime Naruto, Madara Uchihas staff.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Staff Madara mod[/b] adds to the game Skyrim new staff Uchihas Madara based on the famous manga Naruto! Staff you can find near the statue of Meridia as previous [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81333/?]mod on a staff 6 ways[/url] [/b]from another mod, in version 1.0 the staff of Madara would not have his true power but you will be able to shoot a wall of lightning, unfortunately staff can't be improved or enchanted, but in newer versions this feature will be added.

[youtube]EAS8GlchrD4[/youtube]   [youtube]JqVPt8-7tQo[/youtube]

If you can't find the staff Madara Uchihas on the screenshots provided to you at the beginning of the publication, I invite you to view a short video snippet which demonstrates staff himself, how he looks his magic and where can I find it.
author: Aksyonov

files.name: Staff Uchihas Madara by Aksyonov v1.0
